channel.title: No "Attack" Option In wildernis
channel.description:
Like above.
When I walk into the wildernis and try to attack someone, The only options that are showing are. Walk/Trade/Follow.
Proberly an easy fix, But i dont know.
It's a cleaned PI i downloaded.
